se.kth.iv1350.model

Class Sale

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.iv1350.model.Sale

  • public class Sale
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the central class of the program. Each instance handles one transaction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sale(CashRegister cashRegister)
      Initializes a new sale.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      This ends the current transaction.

      Returns the current state of the sale.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sale

        public Sale(CashRegister cashRegister)
        Initializes a new sale.
        Parameters:
        cashRegister - the cash register in the store.

    • Method Detail

      • finalizeSale

        public TotalPriceDTO finalizeSale()
        This ends the current transaction. It sets the ongoingSale variable to false to prevent adding more items to it.
        Returns:
        the final price of the transaction.

      • sellItem

        public SaleDTO sellItem(int quantity,
                        Item item)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds an item to the transaction. The quantity determines how many of the item are to be added.
        Parameters:
        quantity - how many of the item are to be added.
        item - the item to be added.
        Returns:
        a DTO containing the current state of the transaction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getSaleData

        public SaleDTO getSaleData()
        Returns the current state of the sale.
        Returns:
        the current state of the sale.

      • payForSale

        public AmountOfMoney payForSale(AmountOfMoney amountPaid)
                         throws InsufficientFundsException
        Handles the payment for the transaction.
        Parameters:
        amountPaid - the amount of money handed over by the customer.
        Returns:
        the change.
        Throws:
        InsufficientFundsException

      • getDiscount

        public TotalPriceDTO getDiscount(Discount discount)
        Returns a new total amount depending on the provided discount. It will only apply the discount if the sale has been finished.
        Parameters:
        discount - the discount that is to be added to the total price.
        Returns:
        the new total.
